We founded Lingumi because we want to ma: xxxWe founded Lingumi because we want to make it easier, cheaper, and more fun to teach your child a language at the best age for learning.xxx
We're a team of teachers, learners, comp: xxxWe're a team of teachers, learners, computer scientists, designers, and advisory academics, who love designing effective, fun, playful learning products.xxx
You can read more about our story {{#lin: xxxYou can read more about our story {{#link-to 'story'}}here.{{/link-to}}xxx

Professor of child language acquisition: xxxProfessor of child language acquisition and author of 'How Children Learn Language', Professor O'Grady advises on the academic research that underpins the Lingumi method.xxx

<strong>Teach your child a language</str: xxxTeach your child a language at the best age for learningxxx
A <strong>fun, interactive method</stron: xxxA fun, interactive method for early years language learning.xxx
Our scientifically structured method sta: xxxOur scientifically structured method starts with the Learning Cubes: soft, safe cubes that interact with a tablet or smartphone to teach sounds, words and phrases to children, through play.xxx
Learn over 100 words and phrases from ou: xxxLearn over 100 words and phrases from our free apps, with no in-app purchases. The kit costs £35 inc. delivery to UK.xxx
{{!-- {{#link-to 'products' class=\"btn: xxx{{!-- {{#link-to 'products' class="btn btn-navbar btn-cyan"}}The Cubes{{/link-to}} --}} {{#scroll-to href='#story' label='story' offset=-60 class="btn btn-magenta"}} The Story {{/scroll-to}}xxx
<span class=\"p_starter\">What is it? </: xxxWhat is it? A method developed from extensive academic research that combines tactile physical interaction with digital apps to help children learn a language, by replicating the way they naturally acquire language from birth.xxx
<span class=\"p_starter\">How does it wo: xxxHow does it work? We create interactive games and activities which children and parents play together. Children play learn their first sounds in a native accent, then words, then phrases. The first step is the Learning Cubes: read about them here.xxx
<span class=\"p_starter\">Why early year: xxxWhy early years? 2 year olds are the world's best learners. Due to their brain plasticity, increased synaptic density, and other neurological factors, infants under the age of 6 absorb languages quickly and easily.xxx
<span class=\"p_starter\">Who are we? </: xxxWho are we? We are: 1 English teacher, 1 computer scientist, 1 children's illustrator, + several brilliant academics who advise us. We're based in London, UK. Read more about the team {{#link-to 'about' class="underline"}}here.{{/link-to}}xxx
{{#scroll-to href='#testimonials' label=: xxx{{#scroll-to href='#testimonials' label='testimonials' offset=-60 class="btn btn-magenta"}} What our users think {{/scroll-to}}xxx
\"It gives her so much confidence - she: xxx"It gives her so much confidence - she goes into her own little world"xxx
With the Learning Cubes, kids don't need:
xxxWith the Learning Cubes, kids don't need to tap or swipe the screen - ever.
Interacting with the cubes powers the game.xxx
Children are proven to learn best when i: xxxChildren are proven to learn best when interacting with another person. With Lingumi, parent and child play and learn together. We'll teach you how best to play and learn together.xxx
For early learners, we've replaced tappi: xxxFor early learners, we've replaced tapping and swiping with touching and holding: the Learning Cubes combine apps with physical play that boosts learning, and reduces screen addiction.xxx

We're arriving in more countries all the: xxxWe're arriving in more countries all the time. To get your country top of the list, click to tweet below, or email us with your country.xxx

<strong>First words</strong> learned thr: xxxFirst words learned through play and repetitionxxx
<strong>Contextual language</strong> abs: xxxContextual language absorbed through question games and puzzlesxxx
<strong>Short phrases</strong> learned a: xxxShort phrases learned and practised by answering questionsxxx
The Lingumi Method has been developed wi:
xxxThe Lingumi Method has been developed with early years experts and academics to empower parents and children to learn and practise a language together. By combining physical play with amazing digital apps, the method uses a mixture of physical actions, audio, video, and puzzle-solving to develop children's skills in a multi-sensory and playful environment.
The Lingumi Method has been created to stimulate neurological development through multi-sensory engagement.xxx
<strong>Build basic vocabulary</strong>: xxxBuild basic vocabulary using the Lingumi Starter Kit and First Words app, which teaches over 60 new words, in a structure devised by academics at the University of Oxford that replicates the words a child learns first in their native language.xxx
<strong>Expand your child's knowledge</s: xxxExpand your child's knowledge of the new language, or practise their first language, with question games that build contextual language through guesswork and play.xxx
<strong>Practise speaking</strong> the n: xxxPractise speaking the new language you've learned together, using Lingumi Speak apps which adapt to what your child has learned, and guide you as parent through the process.xxx
<strong>Activate and embed</strong> the: xxxActivate and embed the language your child has learned with intelligent, personalised video and games. Learning through play, tailored to your child.xxx
The Lingumi Method is built on research:
xxxThe Lingumi Method is built on research by the world's top academics in infant language acquisition, psycho- and neurolinguistics. In short, the research we use combines decades of study into how children learn languages, and how their brain works.
You can read more about the academic research into our method in our whitepaper, but here are the key principles:xxx
<strong>Action-reaction: </strong>Childr: xxxAction-reaction: Children learn best when they're rewarded with reactions to their actions. We've build this into our games, creating reactions in our apps to physical actions with our cubes.xxx
<strong>Shared learning: </strong>When a: xxxShared learning: When a parent or carer takes part in the learning, repeating and helping the child to play and learn, the learning outcomes are improved. Our games are designed to be played in pairs or small groups.xxx
<strong>Positive reinforcement: </strong: xxxPositive reinforcement: Using the Lingumi method, children learn through experimentation and free-play, but are always encouraged positively towards learning and discovering.xxx
Buy the Learning Cubes to start learning: xxxBuy the Learning Cubes to start learning:xxx

Encourage your friends to join you on th: xxxEncourage your friends to join you on the Lingumi journey:xxx
Just click here to tweet or share your p: xxxJust click here to tweet or share your purchase on Facebook.xxx

The box creates a playing surface for yo: xxxThe box creates a playing surface for your child to place the cubes, and the stand holds your tablet or smartphonexxx
Our first app, designed with help from l: xxxOur first app, designed with help from leading experts, is free to download, with a second free app on the way. And everything is included: there are no in-app purchases.xxx
Use the Lingumi Starter Kit to develop y: xxxUse the Lingumi Starter Kit to develop your child's English skills, and to learn new words and phrases in 4 other languages!xxx
The kit is compatible with Apple iOS dev: xxxThe kit is compatible with Apple iOS devices (iPad or iPhone) running iOS 8.4 and above, or Android devices running 2.3 or above. The app is currently not visible to the public on the app store, but you will be emailed a link to download it privately.xxx
The kit costs £35 + delivery, which vari: xxxThe kit costs £35 + delivery, which varies by country. To read more about our availability in your country, visit our {{#link-to 'international'}}International page{{/link-to}}.xxx

We'll send you a personal referral code: xxxWe'll send you a personal referral code to share to friends, in return for free goodies. {{#link-to 'contact'}}Contact us{{/link-to}} for more information on referral bonuses.xxx

We've worked with speech therapists and: xxxWe've worked with speech therapists and disability organisations to make the Lingumi learning experience available to every child. The {{#link-to 'products'}}Starter Kit{{/link-to}} uses squishy, child-safe cubes that contain no electronics or small pieces, are colourful, and optimised for tactile, visual, multisensory learning.xxx
The interactive nature of the kit helps: xxxThe interactive nature of the kit helps children with speech language problems to gain confidence. In testing with children with speech delay and associated difficulties, we noticed unprompted repetiton of words after just two play sessions. {{#link-to 'products'}}Try it at home.{{/link-to}}xxx
The Lingumi Starter Kit takes the child: xxxThe Lingumi Starter Kit takes the child away from the screen, turning the learning experience into a highly visual, but interactive one. We've been working with Down's Syndrome charities and families with children with DS to test and improve the kit for special needs.{{#link-to 'products'}}Try it at home.{{/link-to}}xxx
We work with bilingual families in Londo: xxxWe work with bilingual families in London to ensure that Lingumi provides a positive learning experience, and gives their child confidence in their first or second language. Read their {{#link-to 'stories'}}stories{{/link-to}} or{{#link-to 'products'}}try it at home.{{/link-to}}xxx
